instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'recharts' for data visualization.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts links to public/index.html immediately.
3. THEME: Implement the 'Stone & Orange' theme in tailwind.config.js. Extend the colors, do not just use arbitrary values.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize the existing Shadcn components in src/components/ui to match the 'Stone' aesthetic (replace slate/gray with stone).
5. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the dashboard. Don't just stack cards.
6. MOTION: Add 'framer-motion' for subtle entrance animations (fade-in-up) on all pages.
7. PRIVACY: Ensure the 'Privacy Reassurance' is a prominent design element, not just text. Use the 'library_calm' image with a glass overlay.
8. FORMS: The submission form is the core feature. Make it a 'Typeform-style' or 'Step-by-step Wizard' with smooth transitions. Do not dump all inputs on one page.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements as per the rules.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text walls.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95).
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md for sticky headers and overlays.
Spacing: Use p-8 or p-12 for section padding. Don't cramp the UI.
Charts: Use the 'brand.primary' color for the main data line/bar, and 'stone-200' for the grid/axes.
